plot: Only a ninja can defeat a ninja. Sometimes, it takes two. Gordon and Cheetah Lee are stepping up in the name of ninja justice as they take on evil gophers, gladiator midgets, post-apocalyptic cosplayers, and Nazi trash can robots.
plot_en: Only a ninja can defeat a ninja. Sometimes, it takes two. Gordon and Cheetah Lee are stepping up in the name of ninja justice as they take on evil gophers, gladiator midgets, post-apocalyptic cosplayers, and Nazi trash can robots.
plot_es: Only a ninja can defeat a ninja. Sometimes, it takes two. Gordon and Cheetah Lee are stepping up in the name of ninja justice as they take on evil gophers, gladiator midgets, post-apocalyptic cosplayers, and Nazi trash can robots.
title: Ninja the Mission Force
